question: Which city emerged as the best city according to the “Ease of Living Index-2020”, in the million-plus population category?
explanation:
Bengaluru emerged as the best city according to the “Ease of Living Index-2020”, released by the Union Housing and Urban Affairs Minister Hardeep Singh Puri.
The rankings were announced for cities for which the assessment exercise was conducted in the year 2020. Around 111 cities participated in the assessment exercise. Shimla topped the category of cities with population of less than million.
